name: Make Square Puzzle
description:
Description
Make Square is a very funny and exciting block match puzzle game!

Make Square is a very addictive and exciting block match puzzle game and it makes you keep playing!

Do you like puzzle games and lovely colors?
Here comes the perfect game for you, MAKE SQUARE PUZZLE.

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag a triangular block with different orientations to the square space!
• The color of every triangular is not important.
• Merge 4 triangles into 1 square.
• Each of the completed squares will be converted to a score.
• Each incoming triangular block will be displayed in advance.
• Storm your brain to get the highest score.


FEATURES
• BLOCK MATCH PUZZLE
- Ideal for all ages
- Play easily and quickly.

• EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay

• NO TIME LIMIT
- Enjoy game for any time, anywhere and a short time.

• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- You can play offline in anytime.

• STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Soothing sounds and gorgeous visual effects.

NOTES
• Make Square Puzzle is free to play.
• Make Square Puzzle contains ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.

SUPPORT UNIVERSAL APP
• Enjoy the game with various devices. (Phones and Tablets)

Thanks for playing!
